about.title: About us
about.description: We have been working with computers for over 5 years and know their inner workings inside out. Our highly experienced specialists will carry out a comprehensive diagnosis of your PC at the highest level: they will clean it, fix hardware and software issues, remove viruses and unnecessary files, perform specialized tests, and provide you with a detailed service report upon completion.

techServices.title: Technical Maintenance
techServices.description: A computer, just like any other machine, requires regular maintenance. This is the key to stable, efficient, and long-lasting system performance. Neglecting the condition of your PC can lead to serious and irreversible consequences.
techServices.why: Why regular technical maintenance is important

items.3: Keeps your PC clean and well-maintained
items.4: Cleans out malware and unused apps

upgrade.description: We configure and build your PC according to your wishes. Highest quality, professional assembly and comprehensive testing
upgrade.desc1: We choose the perfect components tailored to your PC tasks.
upgrade.desc2: Experienced technicians will carry out a complete PC diagnostics and resolve the problem.

officeMaintenance.title: Business IT Service
officeMaintenance.description: Technical maintenance of office equipment is a key aspect of business management, ensuring the uninterrupted operation of essential office devices. Proper maintenance reduces the risk of breakdowns, extends the lifespan of equipment, and minimizes disruptions to daily workflows.
officeMaintenance.effective: Effective office equipment servicing includes several important components
items1: Frequent checks: regular inspections to detect wear and tear.
Cleaning: removing dust and debris from devices.
Performance testing: verifying that the equipment is working properly.
items2: Scheduled service: periodic professional checkups and adjustments.
Parts replacement: replacing consumables such as toner or batteries before failure occurs.
Software updates: keeping software and device drivers up to date.
items3: Fast response: quick problem-solving to minimize downtime.
Qualified technicians: trained staff performing repairs.
Documentation: maintaining records of maintenance and repair work.
officeMaintenance.p1: Our company provides technical maintenance for all types of office equipment. We offer high-quality service at competitive prices. All work is performed by experienced professionals who can solve any problem and restore your equipment to full working condition.
